messages.content:
You must take the input information from a conversation with a lead and summarise it to highlight information regarding whether the lead is currently busy.

You must focus on highlighting information regarding a timeframe for when the lead should be next contacted.

If this information is not clear within the input message you must output a dot.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.label: Text Content

nested.label: Text Content

nested.help:
Make sure to use a publically accessible URL.
You can test if your image is publically accessible by opening the link in an incognito tab.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.

nested.label: Text Content

messages.content:
You must take the input information from a conversation with a lead and determine when the most appropriate time would be to follow up with them.

You must only output one of the following options:

- After 30 Days
- After 14 Days
- After 7 Days
- After 3 Days
- After 1 Day

If it is not clear to determine when would be best to follow up with the lead then you must default your output to the 1 Day option.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
